channel.title: JWT on Ruddra
channel.link:
https://ruddra.com/tags/jwt/Recent content in JWT on RuddraHugo -- gohugo.ioWed, 22 Apr 2020 00:00:00 +0600
Create an Application with JWT based Authentication in 10 Minutes using Djangohttps://ruddra.com/posts/django-jwt-auth-app-in-10-mins/Wed, 22 Apr 2020 00:00:00 +0600https://ruddra.com/posts/django-jwt-auth-app-in-10-mins/Let us say, you need an authentication service in a rush, which needs to be cutting edge and uses JWT based authentication. Or you need a stand alone authentication service to be plugged in with other microservices. Do not worry, you can create one in 10 minutes. All you need to have is Python and Docker installed in your machine.
